text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's summer—time for Umamusume to<n>tackle new
challenges at the balmy<n>beachside training camp.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Onward... to beauty!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Splish, splash!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Hah! Brilliantly now!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Splash!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Opera O seems to be enjoying herself<n>frolicking in the
water, though I'm<n>clueless as to what kind of regimen<n>this
is.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Huff, puff... Well, Trainer? Wereyou inspired by the whimsy of mywater training?
choice_data_list: You showed a lot of spirit.
You showed a lot of spirit.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Haaah ha ha ha! Excellent<n>observation, as always. The
theme for<n>this performance was "freeing the<n>inner me."

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Strong muscles aren't the only thing<n>to be gained in the sea.
There's also<n>an inner strength to be had by freely<n>
expressing one's true self.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
My rippling of the water is at times<n>serene, and at times
turbulent. What<n>you'll witness now would make a<n>
mermaid turn green with envy!

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Oh, I heard about her. She's really...<n>something, isn't she? I
know it's fun<n>to splash around in the water, but<n>still...

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
Oh, uh, hehe... Yeeeah, for someone<n>like Opera O, it makes
sense. Even<n>when she's racing, she's really, um,<n>at
ease?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
No matter what the people around us<n>say, Opera O continues
with<n>single-minded determination.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Now a wide turn here! Skim the sand<n>like so... and flutter like
a butterfly!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: The white clouds, the blue sea, theroaring waves, and the beauteousme! This summer will onlyhappen once, so I must use everyounce of my being!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Now I'm even less sure what she's<n>doing, but she's doing
it with gusto.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Opera O is pursuing her goal without<n>hesitation, so her
trainer can't just sit<n>back and watch.
choice_data_list: Let's make this the best training camp ever!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Well said! My training shall be<n>ceaseless as the tides! My
harmony<n>with the vast ocean will make the<n>beach itself
sing!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After our long day of training, I'm<n>back at the dorms taking
a<n>much-needed break.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: There you are, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Well, I come bearing an important<n>matter to discuss.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
But first, I'd like to adjust what time<n>we start tomorrow.
What say you to 4<n>a.m.?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Early, you say... Ah, you're right!<n>Summer it may be, but the
sun is yet<n>to rise at that hour.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
We'd need more sunlight for a proper<n>backdrop during my
performance. I<n>agree—better to wait until a little later<n>to
start.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Hm... Then, once we've begun, I will<n>enter the water slowly,
whilst pushing<n>back my hair in a dramatic fashion.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Like a fish nestled amongst sea<n>anemones, I'll sway and
synchronize<n>with the waves in an elegant dance.
choice_data_list:
Some anemones are poisonous, so let's watch
out for those...

Some anemones are poisonous, so let's watch
out for those...

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Really? You don't say. Then I'll be<n>sure to keep my limbs
from becoming<n>too acquainted with them.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
And after a dramatic pause, I'll burst<n>forth from the sea,
singing as the salty<n>droplets fall around me! Even the<n>
sirens of midsummer will fall in love<n>with my voice!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Just like a post-race concert, we must<n>always top things off
with a<n>heart-rousing song.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
The beachgoers will be moved to<n>tears as they celebrate
me with<n>thunderous applause. Ah, it shall be<n>perfect!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Haaah ha ha ha! I'm filled with<n>excitement for tomorrow!
Until we<n>meet again on the training field!
choice_data_list: Didn't you want to ask me about something?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Ah, that. It's all cleared up now.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
I had several concerns related to my<n>training, about whether
I should really<n>continue down my own path or not.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
But speaking to you just now, I was<n>reminded that you, at
least, offer<n>candid thoughts of concern—not<n>denial.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Your direction is to the point—never<n>dismissive or given with
your eyes<n>glazed over.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
I knew I'd made the right decision. So<n>I have no more need
to confirm and<n>can proceed without fear.
choice_data_list: You were thinking about all that?
You were thinking about all that?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, what? Even I have times when<n>I question my own
actions—whether<n>they're correct or not.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
But I could never let anyone see such<n>doubt in my eyes.
I'm the<n>Umamusume who will become the<n>Centurial
Overlord after all.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Heh, as a true sovereign should be.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Well, I must start preparing for<n>tomorrow. I wouldn't want
my<n>audience to be disappointed.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Ah, yes, that's right. There was one<n>more thing.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
If I were to ever again want to recite<n>my thoughts on the
future... may I<n>count on you to lend your ear?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Haaah ha ha ha ha! I really am<n>amazing to find such a fine
trainer!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's another wonderful day, and<n>Opera O is doing her own
thing for<n>training again.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Look, the rising sun blesses my<n>coming once again. I'll
waste not a<n>second and get right to work!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
First I'll let my hair flow in the fresh<n>sea air. A brush of the
hand through it,<n>and then a flash of a wink to my<n>adoring
fans...

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Haaah ha ha ha ha! I am sogorgeous this day!

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text: That Opera O's looking, er, dreamy as<n>ever.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha, for real. I'm kinda jealous<n>though. I wish I had that
kind of<n>confidence.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Heh, there's not a single other<n>Umamusume on this beach
who can<n>equal my radiance! Wouldn't you<n>agree, my fine
trainer?
choice_data_list: Yeah, you're the best, Opera O!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Well said! For I am to be theCenturial Overlord—she who will bathethe world in her stunning light!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
T.M. Opera O is exploding with<n>confidence. For her though,
that's<n>just like any other day.
